images.alt: DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Vanilla Frozen Desert Cones, Multipack, 6 x 60ml.
drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: The creamy, crunchy, classic Vanilla DRUMSTICK now comes in a mini-sized treat. DRUMSTICK Minis, Simply Dipped Vanilla feature the same creamy vanilla covered with a rich chocolatey coating in a smaller size. Made with dairy from Canadian cows, this 6-Pack is sure to excite your buds and tastebuds alike. Raise your cone to DRUMSTICK goodness!
DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped VanillaFeatures and Benefits
Delicious mini cones featuring creamy vanilla covered with a rich chocolatey coating.
Smaller in size, but just as big on taste!
Creamy and tasty, our dairy comes from Canadian cows. We are proud to support the Canadian dairy industry!
Includes no artificial colours or flavours – just tastiness!
DRUMSTICK has been the original sundae cone®for over 80 years
